    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030419</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Taxonomía</string>
            <string language="en">Taxonomy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Taxonomie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Taxonomie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Taxonomy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tassonomia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξονομία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Esta unidad trata sobre el tema de clasificación, empezando por el concepto de taxonomía, continuando con los distintos taxones y los criterios de clasificación y finalizando con la nomenclatura binomial.</string>
            <string language="en">This units deals with the topic of classification, starting with the concept of taxonomy, continuing with the different taxons and the classification criteria and ending with binomial nomenclature.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Taxonomía</string>
            <string language="en">Taxonomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses beschäftigt Maßeinheiten das Thema der 
Klassifikation, beginnend mit dem Konzept von Taxonomie, fährt mit 
den unterschiedlichen Taxons und den Klassifikationkriterien fort und 
beendet mit binomialer Bezeichnung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce les unités traite le sujet de la 
classification, commençant par le concept de la taxonomie, continuant
les différents taxons et les critères de classification et 
terminant avec la nomenclature binomiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este as unidades tratam do tópico da 
classificação, começando com o conceito do taxonomy, continuando 
com os táxons diferentes e os critérios da classificação e 
terminando com nomenclatura binomial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo le unità si occupa del soggetto della 
classificazione, cominciando dal concetto di tassonomia, continuante 
con i taxons differenti ed i test di verifica di classificazione e 
concludentesi con la nomenclatura binomiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι μονάδες εξετάζουν το θέμα της ταξινόμησης, 
αρχίζοντας από την έννοια της ταξονομίας, που συνεχίζεται με τα 
διαφορετικά taxons και τα κριτήρια ταξινόμησης και που 
τελειώνει με τη δυωνυμική ονοματολογία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Taxonomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
